verses.verse: My son, <S%H1121><s%> keep <S%H8104><s%> my words. <S%H561><s%> Lay up <S%H6845><s%> my commandments within you. <S%H4687><s%>
Keep <S%H8104><s%> my commandments <S%H4687><s%> and live! <S%H2421><s%> Guard my teaching <S%H8451><s%> as the apple <S%H380><s%> of your eye. <S%H5869><s%>
Bind <S%H7194><s%> them on your fingers. <S%H676><s%> Write <S%H3789><s%> them on the tablet <S%H3871><s%> of your heart. <S%H3820><s%>
Tell <S%H559><s%> wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> "You are my sister. <S%H269><s%>" Call <S%H7121><s%> understanding <S%H2451><s%> your relative, <S%H4129><s%>
that they may keep <S%H8104><s%> you from the strange <S%H2114><s%> woman, <S%H802><s%> from the foreigner <S%H5237><s%> who flatters <S%H2505><s%> with her words. <S%H561><s%>
For at the window <S%H2474><s%> of my house, <S%H1004><s%> I looked <S%H8259><s%> out through my lattice. <S%H822><s%>
I saw <S%H7200><s%> among the simple ones. <S%H6612><s%> I discerned <S%H995><s%> among the youths <S%H1121><s%> a young man <S%H5288><s%> void <S%H2638><s%> of understanding, <S%H3820><s%>
passing through <S%H5674><s%> the street <S%H7784><s%> near <S%H681><s%> her corner, <S%H6434><s%> he went <S%H6805><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> to her house, <S%H1004><s%>
in the twilight, <S%H5399><s%> in the evening <S%H3117><s%> of the day, <S%H380><s%> in the middle of the night <S%H3915><s%> and in the darkness. <S%H653><s%>
Behold, <S%H802><s%> there a woman met <S%H7125><s%> him with the attire <S%H7897><s%> of a prostitute, <S%H2181><s%> and with crafty <S%H5341><s%> intent. <S%H3820><s%>
She is loud <S%H1993><s%> and defiant. <S%H5637><s%> Her feet <S%H7272><s%> don't <S%H7931><s%> stay in her house. <S%H1004><s%>
Now <S%H6471><s%> she is in the streets, <S%H7339><s%> now <S%H6471><s%> in the squares, <S%H7339><s%> and lurking <S%H693><s%> at <S%H681><s%> every corner. <S%H6438><s%>
So she caught <S%H2388><s%> him, <S%H5401><s%> and kissed him. <S%H5810><s%> With an impudent face <S%H6440><s%> she said to him: <S%H559><s%>
"Sacrifices of peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings <S%H2077><s%> are with me. <S%H3117><s%> This day I have paid <S%H7999><s%> my vows. <S%H5088><s%>
Therefore I came out <S%H3318><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> you, <S%H7836><s%> to diligently seek your face, <S%H6440><s%> and I have found you. <S%H4672><s%>
I have spread <S%H7234><s%> my couch <S%H6210><s%> with carpets <S%H4765><s%> of tapestry, <S%H2405><s%> with striped cloths of the yarn <S%H330><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>
I have perfumed <S%H5130><s%> my bed <S%H4904><s%> with myrrh, <S%H4753><s%> aloes, <S%H174><s%> and cinnamon. <S%H7076><s%>
Come, <S%H3212><s%> let <S%H7301><s%>'s take our fill of loving <S%H1730><s%> until the morning. <S%H1242><s%> Let <S%H5965><s%>'s solace ourselves with loving. <S%H159><s%>
For my husband <S%H376><s%> isn't <S%H1004><s%> at home. He has gone <S%H1980><s%> on a long <S%H7350><s%> journey. <S%H1870><s%>
He has taken <S%H3947><s%> a bag <S%H6872><s%> of money <S%H3701><s%> with him. <S%H3027><s%> He will come <S%H935><s%> home <S%H1004><s%> at the full <S%H3117><s%> moon. <S%H3677><s%>"
With persuasive <S%H7230><s%> words, <S%H3948><s%> she led him astray. <S%H5186><s%> With the flattering <S%H2506><s%> of her lips, <S%H8193><s%> she seduced him. <S%H5080><s%>

He followed <S%H1980><s%> her <S%H310><s%> immediately, <S%H6597><s%> as an ox <S%H7794><s%> goes <S%H935><s%> to the slaughter, <S%H2874><s%> as a fool <S%H191><s%> stepping <S%H4148><s%> into a noose. <S%H5914><s%>

Until an arrow <S%H2671><s%> strikes <S%H6398><s%> through his liver, <S%H3516><s%> as a bird <S%H6833><s%> hurries <S%H4116><s%> to the snare, <S%H6341><s%> and doesn't <S%H3045><s%> know that it will cost his life. <S%H5315><s%>
Now therefore, <S%H1121><s%> sons, listen <S%H8085><s%> to me. <S%H7181><s%> Pay attention to the words <S%H561><s%> of my mouth. <S%H6310><s%>
Don't <S%H3820><s%> let your heart turn <S%H7847><s%> to her ways. <S%H1870><s%> Don't <S%H8582><s%> go astray in her paths, <S%H5410><s%>
for she has thrown down <S%H5307><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> wounded. <S%H2491><s%> Yes, <S%H2026><s%> all her slain are a mighty army. <S%H6099><s%>
Her house <S%H1004><s%> is the way <S%H1870><s%> to Sheol, <S%H7585><s%> going down <S%H3381><s%> to the rooms <S%H2315><s%> of death. <S%H4194><s%>
